registration: New account registration waiting for approval: #UID#
activation: Your account has been activated, you will be able to connect within one day.
activation_html: You will be able to connect within one day.
reactivation: Your account (#UID#) has been reactivated. Your password has been reset to #PASSWORD#.
Activation should be effective in the next hour.
reactivation_html: Activation should be effective in the next hour.
password_reset_request: A password reset has been requested for your account #UID#.
If this is an error or an abuse, simply trash this email, your password will not be modified.
If you really want to reset you password, click on the following link, a confirmation email will be sent afterward:

If this is an error or an abuse, simply trash this email, your password will not be modified.
If you really want to reset you password, click on the following link, a confirmation email will be sent afterward:
password_reset: Your password has been reset as you requested. Your new password is #PASSWORD#.
The new password will be active within an hour.
password_reset_html: Your password has been reset as you requested for your account #UID#.
The new password will be active within an hour.
expiration: Your account will expire at #EXPIRE#, if you wish to extend the duration of your account, please go to the following URL:
expiration_html: If you wish to extend the duration of your account, please go to the following URL:
user_deletion: Your account #UID# have been deleted by #USER#
confirmation: You have created an account on GenOuest platform, please confirm your subscription at the following link:
You will receive an email when your account has been validated.
confirmation_html: You have created an account on GenOuest platform, please confirm your subscription at the following link:
You will receive an email when your account has been validated.

ask_project_html: #UID# has requested a new project '#NAME#' in My

database_creation:

	Database: #DBNAME#	
	User: #DBUSER#

mail_token_html: You requested a temporary token to login to application. This token will be valid for 10 minutes only.

In case of issue, you can contact us at #SUPPORT#
